articles.description: The boxer, 38, bundled up against the cold as she left a North London apartment with the dancer, 31, on Sunday following their sizzling performance during Saturday's Strictly final.
articles.content:
Nicola Adams and Katya Jones returned to a flat together after reportedly 'partying till midnight' following Saturday's Strictly Come Dancing finale.
The boxer, 38, and dancer, 31, made a comeback d… [+5297 chars]
